content.question: The speaker instructs Xiaoying to

choices.label: avoid eating anything a half an hour before bedtime
avoid exercising a half an hour before bedtime
take medicine a half an hour before breakfast
drink milk a half an hour before breakfast

content.answer: drink milk a half an hour before breakfast

unit.text: 5: Factors That Impact the Quality of Life

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Interpret the distinguishing features of a text.
